fields.name: fullName
fields.description: Full name - used in extended menus, eg BLIND

fields.name: tag
fields.description: Short name - used in small menus, eg BLND

fields.name: inflictString
fields.description: Inflict message - printed when inflicted, eg " is blind"

fields.name: healString
fields.description: Heal message - printed when healed, eg " regains sight"

fields.name: priority
fields.description: Priority - effect with higher priority overwrite other effects

fields.name: resistFlag
fields.description: Resist flag - characters with this flag are immune

fields.name: preventChance
fields.description: Prevent action chance - chance from 0 to 100 chara will be unable to act in battle

fields.name: randomChance
fields.description: Random action chance - chance from 0 to 100 chara will pick random move and target

fields.name: recoverChance
fields.description: Recover chance - chance from 0 to 100 chara will randomly heal this status in battle

fields.name: lethality
fields.description: Lethality type - the game could treat this status the same as being dead

fields.name: halvedStats
fields.description: Reduced stats - in-battle values is reduced by 50% for these stats in battle

fields.name: dot
fields.description: Damage over time - will be inflicted to the afflicted each turn, zero for none

fields.name: dotStat
fields.description: Damage over time stat - quartered and multiplied by DoT power

fields.name: key
fields.description: The key of this object used in code -- don't change these!

fields.name: subfolder
fields.description: Used to subcategorize objects ("/bosses" or "/areas/towns" for instance)

fields.name: name
fields.description: The display name of this object, used only by humans like you

fields.name: description
fields.description: Notes and whatnot on this object
